FONT.B: Q: When did you meet your partner?

P.FONT: Jennifer: I met my boyfriend in a nightclub in London, erm, he's a photographer and he was there taking photos of people and I was one of his photos. We met in 2001.
David: I met my wife in Prague, in the Czech republic, in 1999.
Amy: My boyfriend’s name is Sam and we met two years ago, in New Zealand while we were on holiday.
Winek: I met my partner, Kasia, in 2003.

FONT.B: Q: When is your partner’s birthday?

P.FONT: Jennifer: My boyfriend’s birthday is June 13th.
David: Um, I think it’s 30th May. Yeah, May 30th.
Amy: My boyfriend’s birthday is on September 23rd.
Winek: Kasia's birthday is on 11th May.

FONT.B: Q: When was the last time you went out together?

P.FONT: Jennifer: We went out together on Saturday, we went shopping.
David: We last went out together about three years ago. We went to a restaurant for our second wedding anniversary.
Amy: The last time I saw my boyfriend was last Thursday, and we went out for a drink and then we went out and had some dinner.
Winek: We actually went out together last week. We went to see er, Madonna, erm in concert in Wembley Arena, in London and it was fantastic!

FONT.B: Q: When was the last time you bought your partner a present?

P.FONT: Jennifer: I bought him … ooh I bought him a present last week because it’s our anniversary, next month!
David: I last bought my wife a present two months ago. I went on a trip to Dubai for work and I bought her some earrings and a necklace.
Amy: The last time my boyfriend bought me a present was last week and he bought me a box of chocolates.
Winek: Actually the … the concert that we went to was a … was a present. Her birthday is in May, so she got tickets on 11th May.
